title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.10 - Taxicabs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.10 - Taxicabs

State Regulations

Unless otherwise provided in a lease or other agreement, the
operation of taxicabs or other motor vehicles for hire for the purpose of
soliciting or searching passengers is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
